InstructionData.Title: ALPR - Airlock Pressur Relief
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# ALPR-100 # Airlock Pressure Relief # # Connect the airlock console and two # back pressure regulators to the IC. # After you use the airlock the regulators # will turn on for a short period to # make sure your pipes don't explode. # # PSA: you can turn off the console to save power alias Console d0 # airlock console alias IntVent d1 # interior vent alias ExtVent d2 # exterior vent alias IntSensor d4 alias ExtSensor d5
alias devVent r0 alias devSensor r1 alias setting r2 alias lastSetting r3 alias pressure r4 alias sp r5
define MAXPRESSURE 10000
init: l setting Console Setting mul sp MAXPRESSURE 0.9
# wait for console setting to change start: yield move lastSetting setting l setting Console Setting s db Setting setting beq setting lastSetting start beq 5 setting extopen beq 2 setting intopen j start
# exterior door is open, drain exterior extopen: move devVent 2 move devSensor 5 j drain
# interior door is open, drain interior intopen: move devVent 1 move devSensor 4 j drain
drain: s dr1 On 1 l pressure dr1 Pressure ble pressure MAXPRESSURE poweroff s dr0 Lock 0 s dr0 On 1 s dr0 PressureExternal 150 s dr0 Mode 0
drainloop: yield l pressure dr1 Pressure s db Setting pressure move lastSetting setting l setting Console Setting bne setting lastSetting interrupt bgt pressure sp drainloop
enddrain: s dr0 On 0
interrupt: s dr0 Mode 1
poweroff: s dr0 Lock 1 yield s dr1 On 0 j start
